lines.text: Last night in L.A. a Japanese family of three was found shot to death. The family had just arrived from Tokyo and was driving a low rates rental car.
When would I have time to date?
I usually don't take a drink from a stranger.
Well, I'm Kyle,you're Allie. Now we're no longer strangers.
How would you like some more champagne?
I know you shouldn't, but that doesn't mean you won't.
Why didn't you tell me that it was Madelin Barton? She is the head of the company we were signing on.
I think we need to call the police.
No, we can't call the cops that's not an option now.
Exactly, it's not going away. It's over. It's done.
